autoStart.description: Whether the timer should start automatically

countdown.description: Whether the timer should countdown, decrementing the timer on each tick.

ids.description: The ids of the timer parts

interval.description: The interval in milliseconds to update the timer count.

onComplete.description: Function invoked when the timer is completed

onTick.description: Function invoked when the timer ticks

startMs.description: The total duration of the timer in milliseconds.

targetMs.description: The minimum count of the timer in milliseconds.
